response_parsed.title: Refactoring Event-Driven Systems Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates the process of refactoring an event-driven system using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Utilizing FastAPI's Router and Dependency Injection to organize event handlers
Adopting asynchronous event handling for better performance
Leveraging FastAPI's built-in support for OpenAPI 3.0 specifications
Implementing FastAPI Middleware for additional functionality

version_notes: This guide focuses on FastAPI version 0.68.0 and Python 3.12.
Ensure you have the latest versions of both for optimal results.
